text: sum tame tene pana joyo, jene potani maneccha'one potano pujya banavi rakhyo che ane bud'dhi hova chatam allaha'e tene pathabhrasta kari didho ane tena kana ane dila para mahora lagavi didhi che ane teni ankho para pana parado nankhi didho che, have ava vyaktine allaha sivaya kona satya margadarsana api sake che
